citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:55 AM on
11DEC2024.
The store appeared vacant and the store sign was removed from the building. The inspectors continued to site 001.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
Additional Inspectors:
KURT HAMMEL, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
